definition: eloquent/oratory/rhetoric
male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
to dispute/to debate/to argue/to discuss
facts speak louder than words (idiom)
pinyin: shi4 shi2 sheng4 yu2 xiong2 bian4

definition: orator

sentences.english: He roused the masses with his oratory .
sentences.chinese: 他以其雄辯術喚起民衆。

sentences.english: I'm no orator , as he is.
sentences.chinese: 我不善言語，而他卻是位雄辯家。

sentences.english: He expressed his sentiments about the war with great eloquence.
sentences.chinese: 他雄辯地表達了他對那場戰爭的看法。

sentences.english: The eloquent lawyer impugned the witness's story in the court.
sentences.chinese: 這位雄辯的律師在法庭上對證人的證言提出質疑。

sentences.english: Discretion in speech is more than eloquence.
sentences.chinese: 演說的辨別力不止是雄辯。

sentences.english: He was first and foremost a fiery orator in the 19th century mold.
sentences.chinese: 他卻是19世紀中期首屈一指的富於熱情的雄辯家。

sentences.english: He is rarely seen speaking from a script. His eloquent speech has always retained the attention of his listeners.
sentences.chinese: 他很少看着講稿發言，他雄辯的演說始終吸引着聽衆。

sentences.english: I am afraid my eloquence did not avail against the facts.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我的雄辯也無補於事實了。

sentences.english: Unprofitable eloquence is like the cypress,which is great and tall,but bears no fruit.
sentences.chinese: 無益的雄辯猶如高大的柏樹，不會結果。

sentences.english: The speaker is exceptionally eloquent today.
A single fact is worth a shipload of arguments.
sentences.chinese: 一樁事實抵得上一船雄辯。

sentences.english: His oratorical efforts evoked no response in his audience.
sentences.chinese: 他的雄辯在聽衆中不起反響。

sentences.english: The Mencius' essays, which are greatly powerful and eloquent, are also one of the classical works of Confucianism.
sentences.chinese: 孟子的散文也是儒家經典之一，氣勢如虹，十分雄辯。

sentences.english: He carried his audience along with his eloquence.
sentences.chinese: 他雄辯的口才吸引住聽衆。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, words are, as a rule, the shallowest portion of all the argument.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，在一切雄辯中，語言往往是最淺薄的部分。

sentences.english: This type of rhetoric, and some of the language in the CSPI letter, isn't sitting well with McDonald's.
sentences.chinese: CSPI信中的這種雄辯，並沒有讓麥當勞信服。
